verses.verse: Now Moses<WH4872> was keeping<WH1961> the flock<WH6629> of Jethro,<WH3503> his father-in<WH2859>-law, the priest<WH3548> of Midian,<WH4080> and he led<WH5090> the flock<WH6629> to the back<WH310> of the wilderness,<WH4057> and came<WH935> to God<WH430>'s mountain,<WH2022> to Horeb.<WH2722>

The angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> to him in a flame<WH3827> of fire<WH784> out of the middle<WH8432> of a bush.<WH5572> He looked,<WH7200> and behold,<WH5572> the bush burned<WH1197> with fire,<WH784> and the bush<WH5572> was not consumed.<WH398>
Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> "I will turn aside<WH5493> now,<WH7200> and see this great<WH1419> sight,<WH4758> why<WH4069> the bush<WH5572> is not burnt.<WH1197>"

When Yahweh<WH3068> saw<WH7200> that he turned aside<WH5493> to see,<WH7200> God<WH430> called<WH7121> to him out of the middle<WH8432> of the bush,<WH5572> and said,<WH559> "Moses!<WH4872> Moses!<WH4872>" He said,<WH559> "Here I am."
He said,<WH559> "Don't<WH7126> come close.<WH1988> Take your sandals<WH5275> off<WH5394> of your feet,<WH7272> for the place<WH4725> you are standing<WH5975> on<WH834> is holy<WH6944> ground.<WH127>"

Moreover he said,<WH559> "I am the God<WH430> of your father,<WH1> the God<WH430> of Abraham,<WH85> the God<WH430> of Isaac,<WH3327> and the God<WH430> of Jacob.<WH3290>" Moses<WH4872> hid<WH5641> his face;<WH6440> for he was afraid<WH3372> to look<WH5027> at God.<WH430>

Yahweh<WH3068> said,<WH559> "I have surely<WH7200> seen<WH7200> the affliction<WH6040> of my people<WH5971> who are in Egypt,<WH4714> and have heard<WH8085> their cry<WH6818> because<WH6440> of their taskmasters,<WH5065> for I know<WH3045> their sorrows.<WH4341>

I have come down<WH3381> to deliver<WH5337> them out of the hand<WH3027> of the Egyptians,<WH4714> and to bring<WH5927> them up out of that land<WH776> to a good<WH2896> and large<WH7342> land,<WH776> to a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey;<WH1706> to the place<WH4725> of the Canaanite,<WH3669> the Hittite,<WH2850> the Amorite,<WH567> the Perizzite,<WH6522> the Hivite,<WH2340> and the Jebusite.<WH2983>
Now,<WH6818> behold, the cry of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> has come<WH935> to me.<WH7200> Moreover I have seen the oppression<WH3906> with which the Egyptians<WH4714> oppress them.<WH3905>
Come<WH3212> now therefore,<WH7971> and I will send you to Pharaoh,<WH6547> that you may bring my people,<WH5971> the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> out<WH3318> of Egypt.<WH4714>"
Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to God,<WH430> "Who am I,<WH3212> that I should go to Pharaoh,<WH6547> and that I should bring the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out<WH3318> of Egypt?<WH4714>"

He said,<WH559> "Certainly I will be with you.<WH226> This will be the token to you,<WH3588> that I have sent<WH7971> you:<WH5971> when you have brought the people out<WH3318> of Egypt,<WH4714> you shall serve<WH5647> God<WH430> on this mountain.<WH2022>"

Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to God,<WH430> "Behold,<WH935> when I come to the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and tell<WH559> them,<WH430> 'The God of your fathers<WH1> has sent<WH7971> me to you;<WH559>' and they ask me,<WH8034> 'What is his name?' What should I tell them?<WH559>"
God<WH430> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "I AM<WH1961> WHO I AM,<WH1961>" and he said,<WH559> "You shall tell<WH559> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> this:<WH7971> 'I AM has sent me to you.'"

God<WH430> said<WH559> moreover<WH5750> to Moses,<WH4872> "You shall tell<WH559> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> this,<WH3068> 'Yahweh, the God<WH430> of your fathers,<WH1> the God<WH430> of Abraham,<WH85> the God<WH430> of Isaac,<WH3327> and the God<WH430> of Jacob,<WH3290> has sent<WH7971> me to you.<WH8034>' This is my name forever,<WH5769> and this is my memorial<WH2143> to all<WH1755> generations.<WH1755>

Go,<WH3212> and gather<WH622> the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> together,<WH622> and tell<WH559> them,<WH3068> 'Yahweh, the God<WH430> of your fathers,<WH1> the God<WH430> of Abraham,<WH85> of Isaac,<WH3327> and of Jacob,<WH3290> has appeared<WH7200> to me,<WH559> saying, "I have surely<WH6485> visited<WH6485> you,<WH6213> and seen that which is done to you in Egypt;<WH4714>

and I have said,<WH559> I will bring<WH5927> you up out of the affliction<WH6040> of Egypt<WH4714> to the land<WH776> of the Canaanite,<WH3669> the Hittite,<WH2850> the Amorite,<WH567> the Perizzite,<WH6522> the Hivite,<WH2340> and the Jebusite,<WH2983> to a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey.<WH1706>"'

They will listen<WH8085> to your voice,<WH6963> and you shall come,<WH935> you and the elders<WH2205> of Israel,<WH3478> to the king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and you shall tell<WH559> him,<WH3068> 'Yahweh, the God<WH430> of the Hebrews,<WH5680> has met<WH7136> with us.<WH3212> Now please let us go three<WH7969> days<WH3117>' journey<WH1870> into the wilderness,<WH4057> that we may sacrifice<WH2076> to Yahweh,<WH3068> our God.<WH430>'
I know<WH3045> that the king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> won't<WH5414> give you permission to go,<WH1980> no,<WH2389> not by a mighty hand.<WH3027>
I will reach out<WH7971> my hand<WH3027> and strike<WH5221> Egypt<WH4714> with all my wonders<WH6381> which I will do<WH6213> in its middle<WH7130> and after<WH310> that he will let you go.<WH7971>
I will give<WH5414> this people<WH5971> favor<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of the Egyptians,<WH4714> and it will happen that when you go,<WH3212> you shall not go<WH3212> empty-handed.<WH7387>

But every woman<WH802> shall ask<WH7592> of her neighbor,<WH7934> and of her who visits<WH1481> her house,<WH1004> jewels<WH3627> of silver,<WH3701> jewels<WH3627> of gold,<WH2091> and clothing;<WH8071> and you shall put<WH7760> them on your sons,<WH1121> and on your daughters.<WH1323> You shall plunder<WH5337> the Egyptians.<WH4714>"
